${ModID}:AprilTribute.NAME: [Covenant] April Tribute
${ModID}:AprilTribute.FLAVOR: March blooms, lanterns burn bright. April blooms, a sea of blossoms white. May blooms, yet the old have vanished from sight.
DESCRIPTIONS: Double the effectiveness of #y${ModID}:Orisons, but each #y${ModID}:Orison can only take effect at most once per turn.

${ModID}:BurialGroundsSighs.NAME: [Covenant] Burial Ground's Sighs
${ModID}:BurialGroundsSighs.FLAVOR: Buried are not bones, but unfinished dreams.

${ModID}:DeusExMachina.NAME: [Covenant] Deus Ex Machina
${ModID}:DeusExMachina.FLAVOR:
The roar of gears, the god unseen.
A shell of steel, a skin machine.
A will of frost, the mortals keen.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you get an #y${ModID}:Orison, make it become Advanced.

${ModID}:ReEvolution.NAME: [Covenant] Re-evolution
${ModID}:ReEvolution.FLAVOR: Procreate, procreate. Let the souls carrying the blood of the Mother Tree spreads.
DESCRIPTIONS: Elites drop #b1 additional #y${ModID}:Orison reward when defeated.

${ModID}:TwistedTwinsWhite.NAME: [Covenant] Twisted Twins: White
${ModID}:TwistedTwinsWhite.FLAVOR:
It smiles, you sink.
The White Twin grants you grace, and bids you rest.
DESCRIPTIONS: In the future #y${ModID}:Orison rewards, number of options #b+1.

${ModID}:TwistedTwinsBlack.NAME: [Covenant] Twisted Twins: Black
${ModID}:TwistedTwinsBlack.FLAVOR:
It gazes, you wane.
The Black Twin grants you power, but bids you forget.
DESCRIPTIONS: In the future #y${ModID}:Orison rewards, number of options #r-2. Max [E] limit #b+1.

${ModID}:UnstainedChronicle.NAME: [Covenant] Unstained Chronicle
${ModID}:UnstainedChronicle.FLAVOR:
"The Realm endures"
It records the past, present and future of a realm.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a card into your deck, attach a random #y${ModID}:Orison to it.
